name: Arnav's Adventure
description:
One day, while Arnav was taking a walk in a dark forest, he slipped and fell down a deep, dark hole. 

He fell for what seemed like forever. But, then, he hit a hard stone floor. He quickly got to his feet. Looking for the exit . . .

Arnav's Adventure is a classic 2d platformer where you play as Arnav : a boy who fell into a cave and must get out before the cave collapses.

This game was made as a farewell gift for one of our friends (unnamed). 

Disclaimer:

We did not have much time to make the game. If you find any bugs, Let us know.
